items.summary: Update the frontend dashboard to show a blank/empty waiting state on all panels (SensorDataPanel, AIDecisionPanel, EnergyFlowDiagram, AnalyticsCharts, SimulationControl) when the backend isHardwareConnected flag is false. Display a centered placeholder message such as 'Waiting for hardware connection...' with a subtle pulsing indicator. Once hardware connects and the flag becomes true, render all panels normally with live data. Poll the isHardwareConnected status every 3 seconds using React Query.

Add a 'hardware connected' flag to the backend state. This flag starts as false. When real sensor data is received via the hardware POST API endpoint, set the flag to true. Expose a query function (e.g., isHardwareConnected) that returns this boolean so the frontend can check connection status.
